name: TechTracker
overview: TechTracker, Inc. provides services, publications, and products that enable the management of IT systems and technology. It offers VersionTracker.com, a source for Windows, Mac, and Palm OS software updates, reviews, and downloads on the Internet; and VersionTracker ProTM, which provides customized information by creating machine-specific tracking lists that is accessible through a Web browser or automatically distributed directly to the user’s desktop through the VersionTracker Pro client software. The company also provides MacFixIt.com, which provides Mac-related trouble shooting news, tips, and information featuring daily updates, in-depth reports, and user forums; and MacFixIt Pro that delivers resources of MacFixIt.com including access to MacFixIt Archives, MacFixIt Reports email alerts, search functions, and the option to remove ads. In addition, it offers advertisements through its Web sites for systems developers, IT companies, Mac users, and application and technology consumers. The company, formerly known as VersionTracker.com, Inc., was founded in 1999 and is based in Portland, Oregon. As of August 30, 2007, TechTracker, Inc. is a subsidiary of CNET Networks, Inc.
